title: gati yArE
sahitya:
gati yArE sItApati unnaiyallAl


anupallavi

  matiyilun uru vaittu malaraDi shiram vaittu nidhi ena nin nAmam nidam uraikkum enakku


caraNam    vArAyO manam kaninden tApam tIrAyO vAi tirandanjElenru kUrAyO kaDaikkaNAL
 shaTrE enaip-pArAyO aruL shErAyO padam tArAyO murai kELAyO vEru
